ing: 1 (16 ounce) package coleslaw blend (cabbage slaw mix)
des: "Got 4 ingredients and 10 minutes? Then you're on your way to an apple coleslaw bursting with flavor. Try this Sweet & Tangy Apple Coleslaw as a smart side."
ins:
Mix dressing and honey in large bowl until blended.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
